description: This course covers the finance of technological innovation, with a focus on the valuation tools useful in the venture capital industry. These tools include the "venture capital method," comparables analysis, discounted cash flow analysis, Monte Carlo simulation, contingent-claims analysis, decision trees, and real options. The primary audience for this course is finance majors interested in careers in venture capital or in R&D-intensive companies in health care or information technology. Due to demand, this couse is restricted to Wharton, Senior Finance Majors. If you are not able to register, please add your name to the Wharton Finance Waitlist - https://waitlist.wharton.
name: VENT CAP & FNCE INNOVAT
